snippet: Jared Lilienstein and Michael Polowan of New York City scored a trifecta at the Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional in Manhattan at the end of December.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deals played during the Truscott Board-a-Match event at the Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional in New York City.
lead_paragraph: Jared Lilienstein and Michael Polowan of New York City scored a trifecta at the Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional in Manhattan at the end of December.

headline.seo: A Tie for Greater New York Player of the Year - Bridge
